name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and olive oil.
instructions: Roll out the dough and add sauce, cheese, and basil.
Bake the pizza for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A popular salad made with romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop the lettuce and place it in a large bowl.
Add the grilled chicken and parmesan cheese.
Pour the dressing and toss the salad well.
